boardgame.name: Nemo_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s War (second edition)
Nemo_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s War: 20.000 Meilen unter dem Meer
boardgame.description: Jules Verne's classic novel Twenty Thousand Leagues Under the Sea tells the story of Captain Nemo and his astounding ship, the Nautilus. The second edition of Nemo's War, Victory Point Games' popular solitaire offering from designer Chris Taylor, is a greatly enhanced offering featuring mass-production printing and amazing Ian O'Toole art and graphics throughout._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Set in year 1870, you set sail in this amazing electric-powered submarine, assuming the role and motive of Captain Nemo as you travel across the seas on missions of science, exploration, anti-Imperialism, and War!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;With this supercharged second edition of Nemo's War, prepare yourself for the adventure of a lifetime!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Complexity: 3 on a 9 scale_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Solitaire Suitability: 9 on a 9 scale_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Scale: Time is measured in Action Points which represent approximately 1 week of real time; each encounter is with 1 major ship (its crew and contents) and each area is 1 Ocean._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

For sale here is Nemo_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s War from Victory Point Games. My copy has been opened and played only once. All the original components are included, partitioned in fresh ziplock bags for easier, more convenient game setup; in that sense, it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s arguably better than an unopened copy. Neither the box nor any of the components have seen sunlight; I removed the game from the shipping package and have kept in a cabinet in the basement since, apart from the one play it enjoyed. The box top still has the shrinkwrap on it; I slit it carefully to allow the box to open. A few of the tokens remain attached to the original sprues. I normally ship via USPS Priority Mail, though I am open to alternate suggestions. The shipping estimate comes in at $11.15, at the USPS Priority Mail 3-day rate.
